title: Twitter launches $8 monthly subscription with blue checkmark as Musk moves quickly to overhaul platform
dc:creator: The Associated Press
description: Twitter touted users being able to get a blue checkmark next to their names “just like the celebrities, companies and politicians you already follow.”
